column1: id,"blog","category","markdown"

55,"WN272","Software","  The source code of [MAPS.ME](http://maps.me/de/home) [has been published under Apache License at Github](https://github.com/mapsme/omim). The Russian OSM blog [reports about it](http://shtosm.ru/all/otkrytie-goda/). MAPS.ME is an offline map application based on Qt5 framwork for Android, iOS, Windows, Mac and Linux. Teams of Wochennotiz and weeklyOSM are looking for someone who wants to blog at our blog about a hands-on of MAPS.ME and comparison with other OSM-bases offline map applications. Some users at the OsmAnd Google Group [think](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/osmand/7MAbPRjoNmk) that the rendering engine of MAPS.ME is superior to the OsmAnd rendering engine."

64,"WN272","Software","Apparently, most OsmAnd maps are updated only once a month instead of as hitherto approximately three times per month. Torsten Bronger [supposed it](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/osmand/pOgl0NMVjI0) in OsmAnd-Google Group. We recommend to produce your maps with [OsmAndMapCreator](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/OsmAndMapCreator) by your own."

221,"WN274","Did you know that …","... [http://extract.bbbike.org/](http://extract.bbbike.org/) to [extract areas](http://download.bbbike.org/osm/extract/) from [Planet.osm](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Planet.osm) in several formats like PBF, Garmin, Navit, Osmand, Mapsforge, CSV etc. [Read more ...](http://extract.bbbike.org/extract.html)"
523,"WN280","Programming","Releases

column6: 1252","WN292","Mapping","Dreierlei [writes](http://blog.3rik.cc/2016/02/i-love-free-software-how-to-edit-openstreetmap-in-osmand/) a tutorial on editing OpenStreetMap with OsmAnd."

column1: 1393,"WN294","Software","The new 2.3 version of OsmAnd has [planned](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/osmand/x2XyIOtRBGE/VXx1pbsqAgAJ) to add a new service called [OSM Live](http://osmand.net/osm_live#information). However, this is [considered](https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/talk/2016-March/075631.html) harmful by many, not only because of missing OAuth."
1460,"WN295","Software","An article about how to build [your own offline OSMAND maps](http://thread.gmane.org/gmane.comp.gis.openstreetmap.osmand/11126) using completely free tools."
1561,"WN297","Software","OsmAnd 2.3 has been [released](http://osmand.net/blog?id=osmand-2-3-released), an important new feature of this version is the OsmAnd Live Beta functionality."
1783,"WN301","Releases","

column5: Bugs fixed, better alternate route calculation and more
Mapbox sdk upgrade for in-camera map
Many API changes and some fixes

column1: provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://osm.wno-edv-service.de/index.php/osm-software)"
1836,"WN302","Releases","

column5: New layer filters, Java 9, better bug reports and more
multi-cam capture, new tab bar, tutorial added

column1: provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://osm.wno-edv-service.de/index.php/osm-software)"

1861,"WN303","Mapping","Simon's [WhoDidIt service](http://simon04.dev.openstreetmap.org/whodidit/) has a [new](https://github.com/simon04/whodidit/issues/18) changeset filter for the used editor software. This can be useful for some users who are concerned about possibly duplicated POIs from apps like Osmand or maps.me when the available offline maps have become significantly outdated."

1978,"WN305","Programming","User Chris has released an alpha version of his software [OffRoad](https://sourceforge.net/p/offroadosm/wiki/Home/), which is a desktop port of Osmand. He [asks for feedback](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/osmand/8tFZf9WDvsY)."

1955,"WN305","Software","On androidheadlines.com there is an [illustrated review](http://www.androidheadlines.com/2016/05/sponsored-app-review-maps-navigation-osmand.html) about the android app OsmAnd."

2498,"WN315","Did you know that …","... want to explore the possibilities of OsmAnd on your travels? Matthias Grote from [heise Download](https://www.heise.de/download/team) Team succinctly [sums up](https://www.heise.de/download/blog/Offline-Navigation-mit-OsmAnd-3266747) the most important functions of this versatile OSM app."
2555,"WN317","Releases","

column5: Performance enhancement to the page-cache, fix of --rbu option
Java 7 not supported any more, new function ""Paste at source position"", support geo: URLs
Two breaking changes, seven new features & improvements, eight bugfixes
Many extensions and some bug fixes
New UI, enhanced POI search, improved POI and OSM editing
Update releases fixing a number of issues of 9.5.3
POI for Olympia, updated map data

column1: Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://osm.wno-edv-service.de/index.php/osm-software)"
2652,"WN318","Releases","

column5: New search interface and many fixes
GPS problems solved, better performance, some bugs fixed
Reduced library size, warning added, three bugs fixed
Changes in vehicle and bicycle navigation, better hotel search, new map data
Changes in vehicle and bicycle navigation, better hotel search, new map data
New search interface and many fixes

column1: Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://osm.wno-edv-service.de/index.php/osm-software).
( ) unfree software. See [freesoftware](https://fsfe.org/about/basics/freesoftware.en.html)."
2623,"WN318","Software","The OsmAnd developers [work](https://github.com/osmandapp/Osmand/issues/2941#issuecomment-239700499) on a new rendering engine with multi-threading."

2821,"WN321","Humanitarian OSM","The Missing Maps project is [building capacity](https://twitter.com/osmsierraleone/status/774911691851202560) at [Sierra Leone](http://www.openstreetmap.org/relation/192777#map=5/6.009/1.450) by imparting knowledge on usage of  [OpenDataKit](https://opendatakit.org/), [OpenMapKit](http://openmapkit.org/) and [OsmAnd](http://osmand.net/)."
2881,"WN322","Releases","

column5: Bug fix release with minor fixes
Eight extensions, six changes and 2 fixes
Fixed GPX output format, support portuguese, some other fixes
Eliminates GPS problems, improved audio via Bluetooth, further changes and improvements
Improved user interface, refined POI search
Improved user interface, refined POI search

column1: Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://osm.wno-edv-service.de/index.php/osm-software).
( ) unfree software. See [freesoftware](https://fsfe.org/about/basics/freesoftware.en.html)."

2844,"WN322","Software","The OsmAnd maps of September 1st initially [ignored](https://github.com/osmandapp/Osmand/issues/3067) turn restrictions. This issue has been fixed, newer maps contain turn restrictions."
2901,"WN323","Releases","

column5: Eleven new features & improvements, ten bugs fixed.
One important breaking change and one bug fixed.
Car audio system integration, better routing, bugfixes.
Many changes and improvements, please read relase info.
Login and signup with OpenStreetMap and Google, fixes for more stable browsing.
Added, updated or fixed translations: Persian, Italian, Scottish Gaelic and Ukrainian.
Login and signup with OpenStreetMap and Google,  preserving EXIF tags.
GPS error fixed, new map data.

column1: Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://osm.wno-edv-service.de/index.php/osm-software).
( ) unfree software. See [freesoftware](https://fsfe.org/about/basics/freesoftware.en.html)."

3039,"WN325","About us","This year's OSM donation drive is still [running](https://donate.openstreetmap.org/). weeklyOSM says thank you to:  Peter Karich (Graphhopper) for 1000 Euro, Florian Schenk (500 Euro), Viktar Shcherb (OsmAnd team) for 300 Euro, Andreas Geyer-Schulz, Markus Hallermann, Henri Geist and Julian Hollingbery each for 200 Euro and all the other donors to OSMF."
3088,"WN326","Software","OsmAnd [introduces](http://osmand.net/blog?id"
3164,"WN327","Software","With Christmas coming up in two months, OsmAnd [can show](http://osmand.net/blog?id=christmas_map) as overlay Christmas markets, Christmas trees and other Christmas POIs."

3279,"WN329","Mapping","[Gregory Marler](http://blog.opencagedata.com/post/132428866393/open-geo-interview-gregory-marler-of-living-with) aka [livingwithdragons](http://www.livingwithdragons.com/), writes to the [talk-GB](https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/talk-gb/2016-November/019438.html) about mapping [Key:xmas:features](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:xmas:feature), especially since they are not only in the ""official"" [XmasMap](http://be2art.de/xmasmap/), but also on [OsmAnd](http://osmand.net/blog?id=christmas_map)."
3259,"WN329","Releases","
Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://osm.wno-edv-service.de/index.php/osm-software).
( ) unfree software. See: [freesoftware](https://fsfe.org/about/basics/freesoftware.en.html)."

3452,"WN333","Community","Peter Bremer [writes](https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Peter%20Bremer/diary/39986), in his blog, that Mapillary released new raster tiles showing all traces and photo locations, for use as a layer in map applications that don't support vector tiles (such as OsmAnd). OsmAnd users would find the step-by-step instructions, to add the tileset to OsmAnd, interesting."
3894,"WN342","Software","Osmand shares a gif showing [how to quickly and efficiently](https://twitter.com/osmandapp/status/826835786154795010?s"
4103,"WN346","Other Geo Things","The company SIGRA [asks](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/osmand/LMDhKVs4owc) whether OsmAnd could be adapted for autonomous driving."
4238,"WN349","Software","OsmAnd+ [offers](https://twitter.com/weeklyOSM/status/844950404857237505) a 50% discount for the [app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id"
4650,"WN359","Releases","

column5: Stability in recording increased, reports revised and bug fixes.
Stability in recording increased, reports revised and bug fixes.
Map styles, avoiding unpaved roads and other improvements.
Improved images upload process and some fixes.
OsmAnd integration, new remote commands and some bugfixes.

column1: Provided by the [OSM Software Watchlist](https://wambachers-osm.website/index.php/osm-software). Timestamp: 2017-06-05 17:28:17+02 UTC
( ) unfree software. See: [freesoftware](https://fsfe.org/about/basics/freesoftware.en.html)."
5074,"WN367","Releases","Version 2.7 of OsmAnd is available. You can now [split](https://twitter.com/osmandapp/status/890876198720557056) GPX tracks and [view](http://osmand.net/blog?id"
5250,"WN370","Other Geo Things","OsmAnd [published](http://osmand.net/features?id=mapillary) a guide about the new Mapillary plug-in, which is integrated in the newest version of their app."

5464,"WN374","Mapping","User GOwin [reports](http://www.openstreetmap.org/user/GOwin/diary/42281) about HailHydra(nt)!, an initiative he launched in the Davao region (Philippines), in collaboration with the local fire officials. Its goal is the mapping of fire hydrants, fire stations and volunteer brigades. The tools used during the mapathon were [OSMHydrant](https://www.osmhydrant.org/en/#zoom=13&lat=7.0944&lon=125.5608) and OsmAnd."
5634,"WN378","Did you know that …","... OsmAnd's ""[parking-plugin](http://osmand.net/features?id=parking-plugin)”?"

5694,"WN379","Releases","[OsmAnd 2.8](http://osmand.net/blog?id=osmand-2-8-released) (for Android) has been released. There are various improvements concerning map markers, favorites and distance measuring."

5748,"WN380","Software","Christoph Eckert [wrote](http://www.christeck.de/wp/2017/10/31/using-osmand-and-maps-me-for-a-short-vacation/) a review of OsmAnd and MAPS.ME after using them on a small vacation."
5838,"WN382","Software","Pieter Vander Vennet [shows](https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Pieter%20Vander%20Vennet/diary/42673) how to write your own OsmAnd routing profile."
5986,"WN386","Software","OsmAnd [enables](https://twitter.com/osmandapp/status/938744310924800001) adding Holiday Season's POIs like Christmas markets."

6078,"WN388","Software","OsmAnd is available in [version 2.0](https://twitter.com/osmandapp/status/943090506703228928) for Apple's iOS operating system. The most notable new feature is the routing function. The app can be downloaded from the[ iTunes Store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/osmand-maps/id934850257)."

6164,"WN391","Community","Pieter Vander Vennet [is the Mapper of the Month January 2018](http://www.osm.be/2018/01/12/en-motm-pieter-vdv.html). He got to know about OSM a few years ago, when a fellow student introduced him to OsmAnd. His first edit was a ski slope in Austria, while his current focus is on cycleways. He maps both on-site and at home with a combination of OsmAnd, StreetComplete, JOSM and iD. The [full interview](http://www.osm.be/2018/01/12/en-motm-pieter-vdv.html) is available on the osm.be blog, don't miss it!"

6201,"WN392","Mapping","Now that OsmAnd has started rendering deserts, Warin [has started a thread](https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/talk-au/2018-January/011594.html) on the talk-au mailing list about how to properly map them. The discussion mentions the climatic definition of desert and the difficulty in mapping fuzzy boundaries of such areas."

6404,"WN396","Humanitarian OSM","Tino Raphaël Toupane [reports](https://www.hotosm.org/updates/2018-02-14_from_the_use_of_classic_gps_to_the_smartphone_how_osmand_allows_students_of_the) in the official HOT blog about the use of smartphones for mapping at Lansana-Conte de Sonfonia University in Conakry (Guinea). The equipment was financed by the NGO [Nethope](https://nethope.org/)."
7078,"WN411","Releases","[Version 3.0](https://osmand.net/blog?id=osmand-3-0-released) of OsmAnd is released. Some of the improvements include:
integration of travel guides from [Wikivoyage.org](wikivoyage.org)
improved presentation of Wikipedia content
map markers import
improved rendering of GPX tracks"

7690,"WN424","Mapping","[1] Nick Johnston wrote a [blog post](http://perceptualsolutions.com/misc/writing/rights_of_way/) about mapping Britain's paths in OpenStreetMap. He includes much background information on [public rights of way](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rights_of_way_in_England_and_Wales) paths, He got the data for the paths in his home region Gloucestershire from [Rowmaps](http://www.rowmaps.com/) and surveyed using OsmAnd with the tracks in the bacground. Even if you have no intention to map paths in the UK, just the pictures of his beautiful home region make the article worth reading. He ends his article with the warning that you should not import the data straight away for a number of reasons."

7754,"WN425","Community","The OsmAnd team launched a [short survey](https://twitter.com/osmandapp/status/1039065892083195905?s=19), asking if you know about their in-built Travel Feature, which uses data from Wikimedia's [Wikivoyage](https://en.wikivoyage.org/) project."
7723,"WN425","Community","A bicycle enthusiast from France created [tutorial videos](http://randovelo.touteslatitudes.fr/osmand) (automatic [translation](http://translate.google.com/translate?sl"

8024,"WN431","Software","OsmAnd [seems](https://forum.openstreetmap.org/viewtopic.php?id=64155) ![(de)](http://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads//2016/12/de.svg) (automatic [translation](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=de&tl=en&u=https://forum.openstreetmap.org/viewtopic.php?id=64155)) to partially meet the needs of firefighters, but favourites  with  links to PDFs (e.g. floor plans) would be very helpful. A user is looking for help in the German OSM forum."

8323,"WN437","Mapping","[CartoRoute](https://www.viamichelin.com/web/Maps/Map-Cote_d_Ivoire) (""MapRoad"") is a collaboration between Michelin and the OSM Ivory Coast association aiming to map the main road network across the country: road status, surface, speed limits, traffic signs, dining areas, hotels, and gas stations in the area surrounding the roads, etc. The pilot phase of the project has started in the commune of Plateau (Abidjan) where 11 local OSM contributors collected data during two days using OsmAnd, as related in this [Twitter moment](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1070350550670209024)."

8497,"WN441","Software","The OsmAnd team [reports](https://osmand.net/blog/2019-ny-resolutions) on several nice features and improvements they added over the past year and what we can look forward to in 2019."

8571,"WN443","Programming","Reddit user nanothrowaway [airs](https://www.reddit.com/r/openstreetmap/comments/aep4vf/osmmapcreator/) a lot of grouses about OsmAnd's OSM Map Creator. Various redditors tried to explain why the data is kept in memory for efficiency reasons, but the OP maintained that it's the use of Java which is the problem."

8828,"WN448","Releases","OsmAnd [was released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-2-5-released) in version 2.5 for Apple’s iOS operating system. The most notable new feature is access to their OsmAnd Live subscription. The app can be [downloaded](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/osmand-maps-travel-navigate/id934850257) from the iTunes Store."

8887,"WN449","Software","OsmAnd Online GPS Tracker, not to be confused with well known OsmAnd navigation, [has been upgraded](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-tracker-0-4-released) to version 0.4. The new version allows its users to share the track between specific times and to send their location with a timer, i.e. it stops sending the current location after a defined time."

8984,"WN451","Releases","Version 3.3 of OsmAnd [has been released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-3-released). The team removed Facebook and Firebase analytics from the free version - the paid version OsmAnd+ already didn't include them. The application now offers navigation for public transport, although still in a beta phase, recieved a redesigned directions menu and improved quick action menu, as well as the information about a route."

9036,"WN452","Community","We recently [reported](#wn451_19621) about OsmAnd's new feature to offer navigation for public transport. OsmAnd has now [published](https://osmand.net/blog/guideline-pt) a blog post with guidelines on how to map public transport routes."
9187,"WN455","Releases","[OSM Software Watchlist](https://wambachers-osm.website/index.php/osm-software-watchlist) reports
- Cruiser Android & Desktop 1.6
- Magic Earth iOS 5.05
- Mapbox Navigation
- OsmAnd+ Android 3.3.7
- StreetComplete 11.0
- Umap 1.1
- Vespucci 13.0"

9468,"WN460","Releases","The OsmAnd team promised to bring the iOS version of its navigation app up to the same level as on Android. Version 2.70 has recently been released. Their blog post [details](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-2-7-released) the new features. However, there is still some way to go as the Android version was [upgraded to 3.30](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-3-released) in March 2019."

9577,"WN463","Releases","The OsmAnd Online GPS Tracker [has been updated](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-tracker-0-5-released) to version 0.5. New features are contact search, proxy settings, GPS settings and active markers."

9625,"WN464","Releases","In the new release of OsmAnd 2.80 (iOS), Mapillary photos are displayed for navigation, as is already the case on Android. In addition to performance improvements there were many other adjustments. You can [read](https://osmand.net/blog) more about this in OsmAnd's blog."

9872,"WN469","Releases","The popular navigation software OsmAnd [has been updated](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-4-released). The new version comes with the possibility to create application profiles that allow customised routing, a new compass on the map with the radius ruler and the 'Turn Screen On' option, which turns the screen on when approaching a turn while having the screen off during long straight sections."
9911,"WN470","Licenses","The next OsmAnd version [will attribute OSM better](https://github.com/osmandapp/Osmand/issues/7219), with ""Powered by OpenStreetMap data."" text on the loading screen."

9970,"WN472","Releases","OsmAnd has released a [new version](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-tracker-0-7-released) of their OsmAnd Tracker app. The Tracker app allows users to share their location via Telegram. The new version has live track which shows real-time tracks of your contacts on an OsmAnd map."

10201,"WN477","Releases","OsmAnd [announced](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-3-0-released) the release of version 3.0 of their iOS app. The new version adds a quick action feature to access various map actions from the home screen, the ability to download a missing region map directly from the context menu, and added hints for tags and values to the advanced OpenStreetMap editing screen."

10662,"WN487","Releases","The OsmAnd team has [announced](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-5-released) the release of version 3.5 of its Android navigation software. The application, profile settings, and the map download dialogs have been updated and the basemap offers a more detailed road network. For people planning to ski during the winter, the app now provides ski routing."

10774,"WN489","Mapping","In a Twitter Moment, Dabo Hamda [reported](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1200397226239037440) ![(fr)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/fr.svg) (automatic [translation](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl=EN&u=https://twitter.com/i/moments/1200397226239037440)) that the Guinea community had a two day training and capacity building session, at the Digital Campus of Francophonie in Conakry, for geomatics students and community members in open digital mapping and GIS. On the agenda was: introduction and awareness of OSM and its tools, discovery and knowledge of the local community, data collection with Kobo and OSMTracker, and finally the reuse of OSM data in QGIS and OsmAnd."

10818,"WN490","Releases","The OsmAnd team [announced](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-3-10-released) the release of version 3.10 of its navigation software for iOS. The new version comes with a redesigned navigation preparation screen, support for Online SQL maps, improved control of contour lines and much more."

10946,"WN493","Releases","Less than two weeks after the release of version 3.10 of its navigation software for iOS, the OsmAnd team [followed up](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-3-11-released) with 3.11, which improves the support for languages and GPX trip management, brings a driving style setting for bicycles and fixes some bugs."

10952,"WN493","Software","The OsmAnd team [published](https://osmand.net/blog/2020-ny-resolutions) a blog post with the 2020 New Year resolutions of the now extended team of seven software engineers and recaps the achievements of the previous year."

11086,"WN497","Releases","The OsmAnd team [updated](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-tracker-0-8-released) the Online GPS Tracker to version 0.8. The new version makes location sharing easier, comes with a widget, improves formats and units and fixes some bugs in the Android app."

11171,"WN498","Humanitarian OSM","Missing Maps [describes](https://www.missingmaps.org/blog/2020/01/29/a-year-of-blogs/) their activities during an anti-malaria campaign in Burundi in an article on their homepage. The country’s health authorities asked Médecins Sans Frontières / Doctors Without Borders for help. Missing Maps traced nearly 90 000 buildings in the region of Ruyigi, as large parts had not been mapped before. The article explains how the mapping activities helped and also the role OsmAnd and KoboToolbox played during the  [indoor residual spraying](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indoor_residual_spraying) campaign."

11252,"WN500","Releases","OsmAnd's iOS version is [catching up](http://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-3-12-released) with the Android one. The team has released version 3.12 which comes with an improved route details screen."

11361,"WN502","Releases","OsmAnd has [released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-6-released) version 3.6 of their Android app. The new version includes improved [navigation profiles](https://osmand.net/features/navigation-profiles), the use of exit numbers in navigation, a direct-to-point navigation mode for marine users, and an Antarctica map."

11893,"WN514","Releases","The developers announced the release of [OsmAnd 3.7](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-7-released), available for Android devices. Among the most relevant changes: new offline slope maps, full style customisation of favourites and GPX waypoints, customisable context menu, and more options for the Wikipedia map layer."

11888,"WN514","Releases","For iOS users the new release of [OsmAnd 3.14](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-3-14-released) features beta functionality for public transport navigation, new offline slope maps, options to show lines and direction arrows to active markers, and a new option to switch between top bar and widget to show distances to markers."

11936,"WN515","Software","OsmAnd [announces](https://osmand.net/blog/custom-package) the release of its 'custom package', a new way to customise the app beyond the usual routing profile dependent settings. It allows you to specify your own rendering files, fonts, routings, maps, and other data in a plugin."
12005,"WN516","Software","OsmAnd [turned ten years old](https://osmand.net/blog/10-years). The editors send congratulations on the anniversary."

12057,"WN517","Community","Valeriy Trubin continues his series of interviews with OSM participants. This time he spoke with [Victor Sherb](https://habr.com/ru/post/504112/) ![(ru)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/ru.svg) (automatic [translation](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl=EN&u=https://habr.com/ru/post/504112/)), the developer of the well-known mobile navigator OsmAnd, and [Sergei Astakhov](https://habr.com/ru/post/503060/) ![(ru)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/ru.svg) (automatic [translation](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl=EN&u=https://habr.com/ru/post/503060/)), an experienced programmer who took more than 150 orthophotomaps of the districts of St. Petersburg."

12256,"WN521","Maps","A Dutch user of OsmAnd would [like](https://groups.google.com/forum/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=footer#!msg/osmand/jAhova2KO6g/ihQHSCx3AQAJ) to display 1m contours, a not unreasonable request for a resident of the relatively flat landscape of the Netherlands."

12568,"WN528","Community","As OSM users of [printed maps](https://twitter.com/OpenStreetMapAR/status/1298762117848461312?s=20) ![(es)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/es.svg) and OsmAnd Live, the fire fighters in Cordoba, Argentina, requested assistance in mapping roads, waterways and other elements. The community [launched](https://twitter.com/OpenStreetMapAR/status/1298340321856761861?s=20) ![(es)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/es.svg) a mapathon and in three days they added a lot of information in a very wild area. The firefighters [confirmed](https://t.me/OSM_Naturaleza/5882) ![(es)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/es.svg) > [![en](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/08/en-blue.svg)](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl=EN&u=https://t.me/OSM_Naturaleza/5882?embed=1) that OSM's detailed maps help save forests."

12638,"WN529","Other Geo Things","When US companies were ordered to stop working with Huawei, Google Maps was one of the apps that was dearly missed. Now the Chinese smartphone company has [released](https://www.gsmarena.com/tomtom_releases_navigation_app_on_huawei_appgallery-news-45081.php) TomTom's navigation app on Huawei AppGallery. With OsmAnd, Here WeGo and maps.me there were already some alternatives available in the [store](https://appgallery.huawei.com/#/Categories)."

12654,"WN530","OSM in the media","_GeoSpatial World_ [showed](https://www.geospatialworld.net/blogs/urban-treks-exploring-the-geography-of-your-community-at-granular-level/) which interesting discoveries can be made during walks through your own or a foreign city. [OsmAnd](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OsmAnd) supports the navigation, if necessary, with maps downloadable for offline use."

12726,"WN531","Did you know that …","... there is a step-by-step [guide](https://ilsarrett.wordpress.com/2020/02/26/parcheggi-per-disabili-e-osmand/) ![(it)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/it.svg)  > [![en](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/09/en-green.svg)](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl"

12719,"WN531","Did you know that …","... you can [download](https://www.kreidefossilien.de/konglomerat/geologische-karten-auf-dem-smartphone) ![(de)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/de.svg) > [![en](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/09/en-green.svg)](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl=EN&u=https://www.kreidefossilien.de/konglomerat/geologische-karten-auf-dem-smartphone) geological maps for all of Germany to your smartphone, with this detailed guide, and use them offline with OsmAnd?"

12717,"WN531","Mapping","User stragu [warned](https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/stragu/diary/394199) users of OsmAnd Maps for iOS about a bug that shifts POIs without notice, due to incorrect rounding of coordinates. The [issue](https://github.com/osmandapp/OsmAnd-iOS/issues/833) affects versions 3.10 to 3.14, but was promptly addressed and is solved in version 3.80."

12716,"WN531","Releases","An update of OsmAnd has been released. For iOS, version 3.80 [introduces](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-3-80-released) _application profiles_ with independent settings, the ability to import and export profile settings, the capability to download online maps to cache, and fixes a crash that appeared while starting navigation. On Android, version 3.8 [brings](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-8-released) an updated _plan a route_ function, a new _appearance_ menu for tracks, and improved search algorithms."

13238,"WN543","Software","Moritz Tremmel and Sebastian Grüner [described](https://www.golem.de/news/karten-app-mit-osmand-besser-offline-unterwegs-2012-152467.html) ![(de)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/de.svg) > [![en](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/09/en-green.svg)](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl"

13373,"WN546","Software","OsmAnd [published](https://osmand.net/blog/2021-ny-resolutions) its 'New Year resolutions' for 2021 and also lists achievements from 2019 and 2020. You can select your language directly using the integrated Google Translator on the website."
13553,"WN550","Releases","OsmAnd [3.90 (iOS)](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-3-90-released) and [3.9 (Android)](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-3-9-released) have been released."
13760,"WN554","Software","The free software [Offroad](https://sourceforge.net/p/offroadosm) is an offline map viewer for the desktop. It is based on OsmAnd."
13870,"WN557","Upcoming Events","

column3: Online mapping party in Penza (Домашняя картовечеринка в Пензе) [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/583/)

Exhaustive mapping within certain Budapest administrative boundaries, OsmAnd tour planning (Hungarian) [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/596/)
京都！街歩き！マッピングパーティ：第23回 Re:常寂光寺 [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/600/)
Numérique Éducatif Libre Webinaire : Quels usages pédagogiques avec OpenStreetMap ? [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/551/)
Missing Maps Studentendesk Rode Kruis Maastricht [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/521/)
Missing Maps Artsen Zonder Grenzen Mapathon [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/481/)
PoliMappers: Humanitarian Mapping with Map For Future [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/593/)
column7: 14204","WN565","Software","_Auto Evolution_ [suggested](https://www.autoevolution.com/news/one-more-google-maps-rival-is-coming-to-android-auto-161250.html) that a version of OsmAnd will be available soon for Android Auto."

column1: 14263,"WN567","OSM in the media","_Spiegel Netzwelt_ [compared](https://www.spiegel.de/netzwelt/apps/wandern-und-radfahren-diese-outdoor-apps-erleichtern-navigation-und-routenplanung-a-05a8826a-2b1b-456e-9c2c-d8a1230531c6) ![(de)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/de.svg) > [![en](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/09/en-green.svg)](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl=auto&tl=EN&u=https://www.spiegel.de/netzwelt/apps/wandern-und-radfahren-diese-outdoor-apps-erleichtern-navigation-und-routenplanung-a-05a8826a-2b1b-456e-9c2c-d8a1230531c6) outdoor apps that make navigation and route planning easier. Whether the mountains are calling in summer or your bike is saddled, with Komoot, Outdooractive, BRouter and OsmAnd there will be an app for navigation and route planning."

14519,"WN574","Releases","OsmAnd 4.0 (iOS) has been [released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-0-released). It adds new features such as snapping recorded routes to roads to enable better navigation, exporting and importing of settings, data, and maps between Android and iOS devices, and fixing freezing issues on CarPlay."

14628,"WN577","Releases","The Android version of OsmAnd 4.0 has been [released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-0-released). This version offers cloud backup, the ability to colour tracks by altitude, speed or slope, and other interesting new features. Note that this release introduces new subscription models."

15187,"WN593","Community","Contributor LySioS [has illustrated](http://lysios.free.fr/osm/osmoise/Les_10_cOSMandements.pdf)  the '10 commandments for the OSM contributor' as a short presentation slide deck ![(fr)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/fr.svg). There is also a related [discussion](https://forum.openstreetmap.fr/t/les-10-cosmandements/7485) ![(fr)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/fr.svg) on the OSM-FR forum."

15175,"WN593","Maps","Bristow [explained](https://www.frayssinet.org/2021/11/21/des-vues-aeriennes-sur-osmand-et-un-bonus-ign/) ![(fr)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/fr.svg) > [![en](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/09/en-green.svg)](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl"

15236,"WN595","Software","The OSM BTC system, initiated by OsmAnd, has been [adapted](https://osmbtc.org/) in order to increase the distribution among more active participants. Instead of calculating payments by changes (changesets), now changed objects in changesets are counted. Minimum number will be 300 per month."

15241,"WN595","Software","OsmAnd version 4.1 has been released for Android and iOS. The Android update [includes](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-1-released) support for Android Auto, disables the Mapillary layer plugin by default, and adds app shortcuts – for example, to quickly start a recording to upload tracks to OSM. The iOS update [includes](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-1-released) improved loading of maps."
15355,"WN599","Software","Victor Shcherb, the founder of OsmAnd, [summed up](https://osmand.net/blog/2022-ny-resolutions) the features added in 2021 and ventures a view of what's planned for 2022."

15448,"WN601","Education","Aman Sandhu has started a series of introductory videos for OsmAnd. While the first video [introduces](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tZSfSAkLnYE) the app, the second [explains](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V5-Ldozgje0) how to plan a day trip."

15462,"WN601","Software","Hoerli [has](https://hoerli.net/osmand-google-traffic-anzeigen/) ![(de)](https://blog.openstreetmap.de/wp-uploads/2016/12/de.svg) > [![en](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/09/en-green.svg)](https://translate.google.com/translate?sl"

15437,"WN601","Software","OsmAnd [gave away](https://twitter.com/osmandapp/status/1484515870311391237) 20 of the 'All World Maps' promo codes for iOS and 20 promo codes of OsmAnd Maps+ for Android. [Follow](https://osmand.net/#osmand_giveaway) this link to join the next OsmAnd giveaway."

15568,"WN604","Software","OsmAnd [tweeted](https://twitter.com/osmandapp/status/1491040013668077568) that due to a problem on the servers this month, the generation of maps will not take place until 15 February. If you updated or downloaded the maps for February, please delete and download the maps again."

15794,"WN610","Did you know that …","… that actively contributing to OpenStreetMap [can](https://en.osm.town/@MapAmore/108031721974977104) qualify you for free map updates in the OsmAnd app? You can find more information in the [OSM editing plugin's settings](https://t.me/OsmAndMaps/27551)."
15982,"WN616","Did you know that …","… how to [create](https://blog.strubbl.de/howto-create-in-osmand-a-layer-with-custom-pois/) a layer highlighting a custom POI type in OsmAnd?"
15980,"WN616","Releases","OsmAnd has [released](https://osmand.net/blog/new-website-version/) a new version of their [website](https://osmand.net/)."

16048,"WN618","Releases","OsmAnd 4.2 has been [released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-2-released/) for iOS. It comes with a new map style, improved track management, categorised public transport routes, and displays running routes (OSM tags `route=fitness_trail` and `route=running`)."
16113,"WN619","Upcoming Events","

column3: Open Data Pax: OsmAnd e passeggiata-mappatura OSM al Pratello [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/1379/)
Mapatona de Ananindeua - Meninas da Geo [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/1373/)
京都！街歩き！マッピングパーティ：第31回 妙法院 [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/1368/)
OpenStreetMap 街景踏查團 #2 三峽-大溪踏查 [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/1352/)
EPN d'Arlon - Atelier ouvert OpenStreetMap - Initiation [![osmcalpic](https://osmcal.org/static/osmcal/favicon.png  =16x16)](https://osmcal.org/event/1349/)

column7: 16135","WN620","Releases","Eugene Kizevich [outlined](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-2-released/) what's new in version 4.2 of OsmAnd for Android. Besides an adaptation of the map style, new quick actions and recording widgets, the 'OSM Mapper assistant' option was split into separate options: fixme tags,note tags, icons at low zooms, and waterway tunnels."

column1: 16151,"WN620","Software","OsmAnd [invites](https://osmand.net/blog/twelve-years) you to celebrate 12 years with OsmAnd! You can share a photo with your trip story on Instagram with the hashtag #12YearsOsmAnd; OsmAnd will choose the best and award a prize."
16273,"WN624","Did you know that …","… that there's a [web version](https://osmand.net/map) of the popular OsmAnd app?"

16281,"WN625","Software","Natenom [described](https://blog.natenom.com/2022/07/steigungen-beim-routing-mit-osmand-beruecksichtigen-mit-und-ohne-brouter/) ![(de)](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/de.svg)  in his blog how to include gradients when calculating routes using OsmAnd with and without the BRouter app installed."

16324,"WN627","Maps","For the [May Contain Hackers 2022](https://mch2022.org) event in the Netherlands there is a [special map](https://map.mch2022.org/) based on OSM, which Evelyn also [prepared](https://chaos.social/@mch2022camp/108677820945858563) for OsmAnd."
16396,"WN629","Software","Eugene and Tatiana, from OsmAnd, [explained](https://osmand.net/blog/routes/) in detail how to use and manage the route layer in OsmAnd."

16449,"WN631","OSM in the media","Daniel Kulesz [noticed](https://www.kulesz.me/post/170_osmand_auto/) that modern cars are equipped with headunits that support Android Auto or Apple CarPlay. With the recently added support for Android Auto in OsmAnd, an established open source offline maps and navigation app, his hope for a privacy-friendly solution was re-awakened. Hence, he investigated whether it was practical and possible to use this combination in a data-literate way. He stumbled over several caveats and irritating privacy-invasive issues but also found a semi-satisfactory workaround for the time being."

16443,"WN631","Programming","Paul Jeffrey [reported](https://github.com/osmandapp/OsmAnd/issues/15058) an issue about the OSMAnd app presumably 'leaking data about users' travel history' through a unique identifier. While true, it’s been explained that this randomly generated UUID is used solely to maintain fair usage of the servers’ resources when downloading maps and seemed to be already covered in the privacy policy."

16687,"WN638","Mapping","In a joint project of the Pedagogical University in Krakow and OpenStreetMap Polska Association (OSMP), Polish students [gathered](https://osmand.net/blog/osm_editing_croatia/) over 15,000 new objects and made around 27,000 changes to the database using OsmAnd for the field data collection. Changes are marked with the hashtag #peljesac."
16695,"WN638","Picture","![lead picture](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/638_T_all.jpeg =2048x2048)
Polish students from Krakow update OSM with OsmAnd in Croatia  [[^1^](#wn638_27470)]

16991,"WN646","Programming","Dr  Sybren A. Stüvel has [published](https://stuvel.eu/articles/gps-waypoint-deduplication/) a tutorial on how to remove duplicate GPS waypoints in OsmAnd by using a Python script."

17026,"WN647","Releases","OsmAnd has released version 4.3, which comes with a lot of new features and updates, including a weather plugin and a new default rendering engine for [Android](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-3-released/) and [iOS](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-3-released/). 'OsmAnd Pro' and 'Maps+' subscription plans have been introduced. Active OSM contributors will continue to [get](https://osmand.net/docs/user/personal/maps/#free-for-osm-mappers) unlimited map downloads for free."
17091,"WN650","Software","Victor Shcherb (CEO of OsmAnd) [published](https://osmand.net/blog/ny-resolutions-2023/) the OsmAnd 2023 'New Year Resolutions'."
17481,"WN660","Software","OsmAnd [blogged](https://osmand.net/blog/Elevation/) about different terrain themes and how they can be styled in their app."

17568,"WN663","Releases","OsmAnd 4.4 for [Android](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-4-released/) and [iOS](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-4-released/) was released on 1 April. For Android users tracks can be customised, localised POI names are available, and routes can be shared by link. For iOS CarPlay has been enhanced, hiking routes can be selected on the map, and tracks can be uploaded to OSM."

17611,"WN664","Software","OpenStreetMap BaWü [names](https://en.osm.town/@OSM_tourism/110163577601646179) (via Mastodon) the OSM apps that are already available on HarmonyOS (the OS from Huawei): [OsmAnd](https://osmand.net/), [MapFactor](https://navigatorfree.mapfactor.com/de/), [MAPS.ME](https://maps.me/), [Naviki](https://www.naviki.org/de/naviki/), [Navmii](https://www.navmii.com/), and [Komoot](https://www.komoot.de/)."

17624,"WN664","Software","[Achim Domma](https://twitter.com/achimdomma) has pointed out a tweet by [Katharina Nocum](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katharina_Nocun). In this tweet, the publicist and net activist [complains](https://twitter.com/kattascha/status/1537511718095659008) that pedestrian routing wants to route her through an unlit park at 3 am. Manfred Reiter takes up the problem (in Mastodon) and [refers to](https://social.saarland/@derFred/110163786522921477) possibilities of improving the data through [Mapathons](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Mapathon), organised mapping like the UK [quarterly project](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/UK_Quarterly_Project/2023/2023_Q1_Project:_Fixmes_and_Notes), or [MapRoulette](https://www.maproulette.org/). He directly addresses the publishers of [OsmAnd](https://osmand.net/) and [Graphhopper](https://www.graphhopper.com/open-source/). It will be interesting to see which app tackles this problem first, or whether [Organic Maps](https://organicmaps.app/) will come out on top."

17757,"WN669","OSM in the media","The online magazine _BASIC thinking_ [tested](https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2023/05/07/fahrrad-navigation-osmand-test/) :DE-s:>>>[:EN-t:](https://www-basicthinking-de.translate.goog/blog/2023/05/07/fahrrad-navigation-osmand-test/?_x_tr_sl"
17785,"WN670","Did you know that …","… how to set up OsmAnd [quick actions](https://osmand.net/docs/user/widgets/quick-action/) to have your favourite features on the map for fast access?"

17885,"WN672","Software","OsmAnd 4.4.5 has been released for iOS. The update [contains](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-45-released/) a new track recording widget, a navigation profile for train travel, and search updates."
17873,"WN672","Software","OsmAnd is now 13 years old and they [shared](https://osmand.net/blog/13-years/) some screenshots from the first version."

17896,"WN673","Mapping","Anne-Karoline Distel [blogged](https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/b-unicycling/diary/401713) about drinking water refill stations and has published a video tutorial on [creating](https://youtube.com/shorts/dpKESMNq9Us) a preset and [adding](https://youtube.com/shorts/SqWWdPpZUus) refill options to a shop using OsmAnd."

17989,"WN676","Mapping","arjunaraoc [published](https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/arjunaraoc/diary/401855) a how-to guide on mapping roadside fuelling stations using OsmAnd to collect the data and JOSM to add the new POIs to the map."

17981,"WN676","Software","_autoevolution_ [reviewed](https://www.autoevolution.com/news/google-maps-alternatives-osmand-is-a-top-navigation-app-with-coolwalk-support-217282.html) OsmAnd on Android Auto as an alternative to Google Maps."
18016,"WN677","Software","Eugene [shows](https://osmand.net/blog/rendering/) how OsmAnd users create their own map styles."
18072,"WN678","Software","Eugene [describes](https://osmand.net/blog/raster-maps/) how to use OsmAnd more efficiently with the help of the ""online map plugin""."

18132,"WN680","Software","OsmAnd 4.5 has been [released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-5-released/) for Android. It comes with a free backup function, new terrain and 3D relief formats, and the capability to connect Bluetooth sensors."
18192,"WN682","OSM in the media","Noraly, aka ItchyBoots, arrived in Ghana and is planning and navigating with [OsmAnd](https://youtu.be/PluJpQcric8?t=139)."
18269,"WN685","Releases","Eugene, from OsmAnd, [blogged](https://osmand.net/blog/terrain/) about their app's new terrain map type."

18362,"WN687","Community","Antti [blogged](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-tet/) about how to use OsmAnd for driving the [TET](https://transeurotrail.org/) (Trans Euro Trail), an 80,000 km GPX route, from the edge of Africa to the Arctic Circle, created by the TET adventure motorcycle community."

18528,"WN692","Releases","Eugene [announced](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-5-released/) the release of OsmAnd version 4.5 for the iOS operating system. It comes with free backups to OsmAnd Cloud, added 3D relief, redesigned widgets integration, and more."

18811,"WN699","Software","[Desert Atlas](https://sandstorm.org/news/2023-12-05-osm-on-sandstorm) is a new self-hosted OpenStreetMap app for Sandstorm. It allows users to privately search, save, and bookmark places in collaboration with friends for on-the-go use. Desert Atlas integrates with OSM apps like [Organic Maps](https://organicmaps.app/) and [OsmAnd](https://osmand.net/), enabling users to export their bookmarks. Desert Atlas focuses on privacy and user-friendliness, offering a simple way to download regions and plan in a trusted environment. The app has already been [discussed](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38532914) on _HackerNews_."

18903,"WN701","Releases","OsmAnd's latest update ([Android](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-6-released/) and [iOS](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-6-released/)) introduces customisable top/bottom panels, new widgets for glide ratio, external temperature sensors, sun position, and a redesigned Local tab in the Maps and Resources menu. Users can now create and manage 'Smart Folders' in the Tracks tab, utilise advanced track search filters, and manage deleted files via a new 'Trash' feature in OsmAnd Cloud."

18960,"WN702","Software","OsmAnd continued their tradition, for the sixth time, of [writing](https://osmand.net/blog/ny-resolutions-2024/) up their New Year resolutions. Their main goal for 2024 is to provide the ultimate trip computer experience. They also plan to focus on different external map sources, including OSM Custom Maps. Finding a better and easier way to encourage more people to contribute to OpenStreetMap is also on their list."

19062,"WN704","Did you know that …","... how to [synchronise](https://gnulinux.ch/osmand-tracks-synchronisieren) :DE-s:>>>[:EN-t:](https://gnulinux-ch.translate.goog/osmand-tracks-synchronisieren?_x_tr_sl"

19139,"WN705","Software","The Open Reviews website is offering a [grant](https://github.com/osmandapp/OsmAnd/issues/11111#issuecomment-1892496817) and calling for developers to integrate Mangrove Reviews with OsmAnd or other apps as a plugin."
19300,"WN710","Software","Peter [explained](https://www.graphhopper.com/blog/2024/02/27/osmand-with-graphhopper-navigation/) how to use GraphHopper to calculate navigation routes in the OSMAnd app."
19538,"WN715","Picture","![lead picture](https://weeklyosm.eu/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/715_MT_all.png =864x1156)
Route planned, obstacles found and then bridge, bench, ditch, etc. mapped [[^1^](#wn715_30340)]
19606,"WN717","OSM in action","Rihards Olups [presented](https://mastodon.social/@richlv/112280482128514386) some real-world applications of OpenStreetMap, including:
A fire department that used OSM to map all the houses and fire hydrants in their area and uses OsmAnd to find the nearest hydrants and determine the best routes.
A rescue dog handler who has created their own OSM leaflet app to plan their missions."

19638,"WN717","Releases","OsmAnd 4.7 has been released for [Android](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-7-released/) and [iOS](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-7-released/). The Android version comes with faster offline navigation, extracted route tags from OpenStreetMap data, and OAuth 2.0 for OSM login. The iOS version has a redesigned tracks menu (long press to upload changes to OpenStreetMap) and many new widgets."

19729,"WN720","Community","... elsewhere, Jiří Eischmann also commented on [OsmAnd](https://osmand.net/) and [mapycz](https://de.mapy.cz/zakladni?x=15.6252330&y=49.8022514&z=8). [David Heidelberg](https://hdyc.neis-one.org/?okias), a Czech Linux developer, [suspects](https://floss.social/@okias/112401525551209631) that Jiří has fallen in love with OSM."

19936,"WN725","OSM in action","Peter Van Geit [explained](https://ultrajourneys.org/himalayan-geography-gis-part-3-a-simple-traverse/) how to use OpenStreetMap for planning a Himalayan traverse over multiple days and passing through many valleys. OpenStreetMap POIs such as human settlements, streams, peaks, and camp sites along the planned route can be imported into QGIS for processing the data, and the processed data can then be imported into a phone app, for example OsmAnd, to use during the hike."

20303,"WN732","Releases","OsmAnd 4.8 for Android has been [released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-8-released), with enhancements including terrain colouring, new colour schemes, updated profile views, 3D icons, and improved weather and track visualisation. This update also includes a revamped Quick Actions tool, a detailed track guidance setting, and the removal of login/password authorisation for OpenStreetMap, which now supports OAuth 2.0 for better security."

20353,"WN734","Software","OpenStreetMap user barefootstache [realised](https://en.osm.town/@barefootstache/112951157305917704) that, as of version 4.8, one can have multiple Quick Action trays in OsmAnd. They have [created](https://codeberg.org/barefootstache/OsmAnd-Quick-Actions) a set of trays that they use regularly and instructions on how to make one's own trays."

20523,"WN738","Education","Jiří Eischmann [demonstrated](https://blog.eischmann.cz/2024/09/06/prispivani-do-openstreetmap-body-zajmu/) :CZ-s:>>>[:EN-t:](https://blog-eischmann-cz.translate.goog/2024/09/06/prispivani-do-openstreetmap-body-zajmu/?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=EN) several different methods for adding points of interest to OSM using StreetComplete, OsmAnd, and Organic Maps."
20579,"WN739","Community","Barefootstache has [conducted](https://en.osm.town/@barefootstache/113144760517399728) a field mapping survey using FitoTrack and OsmAnd in Bavaria, Germany."

20641,"WN740","Releases","Eugene Kizevich [announced](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-web-1-01-released/) the release of OsmAnd Web Version 1.01. You can [explore](https://osmand.net/map) the latest version directly at OsmAnd Map."

20761,"WN744","Software","Eugene [introduced](https://osmand.net/blog/3d-track/) the 3D GPX track feature on OsmAnd, which displays route elevation along with visualisations of speed, altitude, slope, and heart rate. This feature offers a comprehensive view, helping users analyse their performance and better understand route dynamics in a 3D visualisation."

20879,"WN746","Open Data","OpenSuperMaps has [extended](https://fosstodon.org/@Pat_n/113439496147291784) its data coverage to New Zealand, allowing users to [download](https://opensupermaps.com/) enhanced map files with detailed address and geographic data for use in mapping applications such as OsmAnd."

20833,"WN746","Software","Jaller94's tool [provides](https://osm-check.chrpaul.de/report/stolpersteine-berlin-complete-by-kiez/) downloadable GPX files that identify missing _Stolpersteine_ (Holocaust memorial stones, we have [covered](https://weeklyosm.eu/archives/17097#wn711_29986) previously) in the neighbourhoods of Berlin, Germany, and [allows](https://chaos.social/@jk/113419187669874817) users to upload these files to OpenStreetMap applications such as OsmAnd to [complete](https://gitlab.com/jaller94/osm-check-scripts) local data for memorial locations."

20941,"WN748","Releases","OsmAnd Android 4.9 [introduced](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-android-4-9-released/) new features such as route recording with speed analysis, improvements to the GPX viewer, and search capabilities, the ability to add bookmarks while navigating, better map rendering performance, and updated public transport tools, improving both the user experience and the versatility of the application."

21091,"WN751","Did you know that …","... the OpenStreetMap Wiki page on map internationalisation [shows](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Map_internationalization) how OSM data supports multilingual names and localisation for global use? It highlights tools, projects, and applications including Organic Maps and OsmAnd that enable maps to display content in multiple languages."

21185,"WN754","Did you know that …","... OsmAnd [offers](https://docs.osmand.net/docs/user/personal/maps-resources/#free-for-osm-mappers) hourly offline map updates for free to OpenStreetMap contributors? Tungmar [recalled](https://troet.cafe/@Tungmar/113758384762209618) :DE-s: being surprised years ago when he had access without a subscription, only to realise recently that it stopped because he was no longer logged in."

21193,"WN754","Releases","OsmAnd has [released](https://osmand.net/blog/osmand-ios-4-9-released/) version 4.9 for iOS, featuring enhanced multi-layer GPX track support, customisable audio alerts for navigation, and improved map rendering. Additionally, this version introduces an updated interface for trip planning and new tools for offline editing, offering a more streamlined and versatile user experience."

21188,"WN754","Software","Victor and Eugene [shared](https://osmand.net/blog/ny-resolutions-2025/) OsmAnd's 2025 New Year Resolutions, showcasing several new planned features to be implemented this year. They also recounted several of the 2024 resolutions that were successfully fulfilled last year."

21192,"WN754","Software","Sesivany has [evaluated](https://blog.eischmann.cz/2025/01/01/mapy-cz-maji-predplatne-ale-seznam-uz-me-naucil-pouzivat-neco-jineho/) :CZ-s:>>>[:EN-t:](https://blog-eischmann-cz.translate.goog/2025/01/01/mapy-cz-maji-predplatne-ale-seznam-uz-me-naucil-pouzivat-neco-jineho/?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=EN) the various OSM-based map applications for mobile phones: Mapy\.cz, OsmAnd, LocusMap, Organic Maps, and Freemap\.sk."

21362,"WN758","Mapping campaigns","Negreheb [shared](https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Negreheb/diary/406030) the progress being made on capturing Salzburg’s streets with 360° imagery for Mapillary and Panoramax. Challenges with route planning tools led to using OsmAnd for real-time GPX tracking and flexibility. They highlighted improvements using CLI tools for image uploads, ensuring efficiency and quality. Inspired by Detroit’s street coverage success, they aim to map all streets in Salzburg to improve OpenStreetMap and accessibility."

21485,"WN761","Community","Damien [reviewed](https://framablog.org/2021/02/12/a-velo-avec-la-carto-osm/) :FR-s:>>>[:EN-t:](https://framablog-org.translate.goog/2021/02/12/a-velo-avec-la-carto-osm/?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=EN) several mapping applications that might be useful for cycling activities, such as OsmAnd, Waymarked Trails, OpenCampingMap, BRouter, GeoVelo, and StreetComplete."
